attributes.action: Stop shops leaving The Lanes Carlisle - we need more not less!
attributes.additional_details: The Lanes need to re-evaluate their rent prices to entice more shops to come and save favourites from leaving. Miss Selfridge, Dorothy Perkins - all shops that have been and gone. Please show your support!
attributes.background: Another shop, New Look is set to leave The Lanes Carlisle. We have many empty shops sitting in this “shopping centre” which is a sad excuse of one if you ask most of the citizens in Carlisle.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the owners of the Lanes, not the UK Government or Parliament.
